languages.text: "Считай, что наши враги уже пали, Вольный Торговец!" {n}Судя по энтузиазму в голосе Ардженты, она отлично умеет управлять танками. Или по крайней мере думает так.{/n}
"Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks — or, at least, she thinks she is.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Считай, что наши враги уже пали, Вольный Торговец!" {n}Судя по энтузиазму в голосе Ардженты, она отлично умеет управлять танками. Или по крайней мере думает так.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks. Or at least she thinks she does.{/n}
"Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks. Or at least she thinks she does.{/n}

"Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks — or, at least, she thinks she is.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Considere a nuestros enemigos derrotados, Comerciante!». {n}A juzgar por el entusiasmo en la voz de Argenta, es perfectamente capaz de conducir tanques o, al menos, está muy convencida de que puede hacerlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks — or, at least, she thinks she is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Considere a nuestros enemigos derrotados, Comerciante!». {n}A juzgar por el entusiasmo en la voz de Argenta, es perfectamente capaz de conducir tanques o, al menos, está muy convencida de que puede hacerlo.{/n}

languages.text: “我们的敌人必死无疑，行商浪人！”{n}从阿洁塔充满热情的声音判断，驾驶坦克对她而言完全不在话下，或者说，至少她自己是这么认为的。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks — or, at least, she thinks she is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们的敌人必死无疑，行商浪人！”{n}从阿洁塔充满热情的声音判断，驾驶坦克对她而言完全不在话下，或者说，至少她自己是这么认为的。{/n}

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、敵が倒れるところを考えてみて！」{n}アルジェンタの声の熱心さから判断するに、彼女は完璧にタンクを操縦することができる―少なくとも彼女はそう考えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks — or, at least, she thinks she is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、敵が倒れるところを考えてみて！」{n}アルジェンタの声の熱心さから判断するに、彼女は完璧にタンクを操縦することができる―少なくとも彼女はそう考えている。{/n}

languages.text: « Considérez vos ennemis comme des hommes morts, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! » {n}À en juger par l'enthousiasme d'Argenta, elle est parfaitement capable de piloter un char, ou du moins en est-elle convaincue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks — or, at least, she thinks she is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Considérez vos ennemis comme des hommes morts, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! » {n}À en juger par l'enthousiasme d'Argenta, elle est parfaitement capable de piloter un char, ou du moins en est-elle convaincue.{/n}

languages.text: "Düşmanlarımızı ölmüş bil Hür Tacir!" {n}Argenta'nın sesindeki coşkuya bakılırsa tank kullanmadan ya çok yetenekli ya da öyle olduğunu düşünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks — or, at least, she thinks she is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Düşmanlarımızı ölmüş bil Hür Tacir!" {n}Argenta'nın sesindeki coşkuya bakılırsa tank kullanmadan ya çok yetenekli ya da öyle olduğunu düşünüyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Betrachtet unsere Feinde als gefallen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. {n}Der Begeisterung in Argentas Stimme nach zu urteilen, ist sie absolut dazu in der Lage, Panzer zu fahren ... jedenfalls denkt sie das.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider our enemies fallen, Rogue Trader!" {n}Judging by the enthusiasm in Argenta's voice, she is perfectly capable of driving tanks — or, at least, she thinks she is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Betrachtet unsere Feinde als gefallen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. {n}Der Begeisterung in Argentas Stimme nach zu urteilen, ist sie absolut dazu in der Lage, Panzer zu fahren ... jedenfalls denkt sie das.{/n}
